sentences.sentence: And, in an ordinary barn, an ordinary pig, a runt no less, stood surrounded by friends, welcoming his second spring. And that spring was followed by many, many more – all because someone stopped to see the grace and beauty and nobility of the humblest creature. That is the miracle of friendship.
sentences.translation: 在一个很平常的谷仓里，一只平常的猪，依旧还是个猪崽，被他的朋友包围着，迎接他生命里第二个春天的到来，当然，他还要迎接更多更多的春天，而这全都是因为有人为他停下来，用心记录了这个最谦卑生命的优雅、美丽和高贵之处——这是关于友情的奇迹。

sentences.sentence: One of the most important things you can do on this earth is to let people know they are not alone.
sentences.translation: 在这个世界上，你所能做的最重要的事情之一，就是让别人知道他们并不孤单。

sentences.sentence: The sooner you learn it’s on you to make your own life interesting, the better off you’ll be.
sentences.translation: 有趣的生活要靠自己创造，这个道理越早知道越好。

sentences.sentence: To do the best that you can and to be grateful for every moment that is great.
sentences.translation: 尽自己所能，并在每一个美好的时刻都心存感激。
